reviews.comments: Perfecta nuestra estadía en los departamentos de Roxana! El lugar es tal cual lo indican las fotos o incluso mejor! Lo recomiendo muchísimo.
Lugar espectacular, muy recomendable, volvería sin dudarlo
TODO EXCELENTE!!!

Indudablemente superó mis expectativas y las de los muchachos q fuimos en patota. Alquilamos los 3 pisos y disfrutamos mucho también la parrilla existente en la terraza. Todo muy cómodo y a gusto... un detalle el vino de recepción!!. Tanto Roxana como su madre .. unas genias .. Siempre a disposición. El lugar esta bien ubicado a pocas cuadras de mucha movida nocturna.- El tren ni se siente asiq todas positivas de nuestra parte.- Cariños por allá. altamente recomendable y sin dudas volveremos
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Horacio por tu evaluación!! Mi vieja te manda saludos también. Beso Roxana

reviews.comments: Hermosos departamentos, excelente ubicacion!!! Volveremos!!!!
Excelente!! Ideal para ir en grupo! Muy cómodos y súper equipados los departamentos
reviews.response: Muchas gracias, me alegro que estuvieron cómodas y lo hayan pasado bien. Un beso y espero volver a verlas

reviews.comments: Muy buena ubicación y muy buena la atención
reviews.response: Muchas gracias los esperamos cuando quiera, Saludos

reviews.comments:
Este increible lugar es tan perfecto como las fotos subidas del mismo. 100% recomendable. Muy atentos ante cualquier inconveniente. La pasamos espectacular. Fué el comentario de todos los que viajamos. Gracias.

saludos.
Gustavo

Los departamentos de Roxana están en una buena zona de Palermo, con muchos restaurantes y boliches cerca. Por dentro tienen todas las comodidades (a/c, refri, cocina, microondas, churrasquera, tv, internet rápido, etc.) y está decorado todo con mucho gusto. Roxana fue muy atenta y cada que teníamos alguna consulta nos ayudaba con mucho gusto. Fue un gusto quedarnos ahí, súper recomendado!
reviews.response: Gracias a vos Rosita por elegirnos!! Besote

reviews.comments: Roxana fue una persona muy cordial y de rápida respuesta ante nuestras inquietudes. El departamento es increíble, con un quincho espectacular para compartir y pasar un gran tiempo. Habitaciones cómodas, limpias y con un buen aire acondicionado. Totalmente recomendable
Muy buen lugar, cómodo!.
reviews.response: Gracias Bea!!! me encanto alojarlas. Besos

reviews.comments: Muy recomendable! Buena atención!

Roxana y Virginia fueron unas anfitrionas increíbles, los departamentos son preciosos, bien equipados e impecables. La ubicación perfecta. Volveremos sin duda la próxima vez que viajemos a BA. Gracias!!
reviews.response: Hola Maria Eugenia, muchas gracias por todo a ustedes y me alegro que lo hayan pasado bien. Los esperamos cuando quieran. Un beso y excelente retorno!

reviews.comments: Gran alojamiento: comodo, porlijo y completo. Propietario estaba totalmente a disposicion.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Agustin! espero volver a verlos

reviews.comments: Muy bueno, Alfonso. Gracias, dale!

La casa está muy bien situada. Son 3 departamentos independientes todos con cocina y baño. La terraza es perfecta para asados. 

Una buena manera de tener privacidad en grupos grandes. Santiago, que nos hizo el checkin, es muy simpático y nos ayudó en todo lo que le pedimos.
Todo como lo esperado. Buena ubicación. Gran atención por parte del anfitrión. La casa limpia y cómoda. Recomendable!
La propiedad esta muy buena, es una propiedad vertical con 3 apartamentos individuales, uno en cada piso y un parrillero en la azotea. Muy prolijo todo y muy funcional

Buen edificio con 3 departamentos individuales para 2 a 4 personas cada uno, muy bien equipado, cerca de estación del Subte, restaurantes, muy amables los anfitriones y muy disponibles a colaborarnos en nuestras inquietudes.

La estadía en el apartamento fue excelente. Es un lugar muy espacioso, ideal para grupos grandes, dado que permite compartir espacios comunes a la vez que tener privacidad y confort (hay cinco baños en total, tres de ellos con ducha). La azotea es excelente para hacer asados, y la ubicación es muy buena, dado que está cerca del subte y cerca de Palermo. La atención de Alfonso, Victoria y Santiago fue excelente también, y los tiempos de check in y check out flexibles, lo que hizo nuestra estadía muy disfrutable. El único detalle, que no nos afectó demasiado, es que una de las cisternas dejó de cargar en un momento, y uno de los equipos de aire acondicionado no funcionaba (cuando llegamos estaban tratando de arreglarlo, sin éxito).
excelente opción!

El barrio es muy entretenido, tiene cafés y restaurants cerca y también a pocas cuadras del metro y de los colectivos hacia otros barrios. Santiago estuvo disponible por cualquier inconveniente. Para un grupo grande es muy bueno, porque es amplio y tiene 3 pisos con bastante independencia. La azotea con parrilla es un buen espacio para hacer la vida en común.

El apartamento espectacular, excelente zona cerca de varios lugares para comer. Muy cómodo para las 10 personas. Estaba en perfectas condiciones cuando lo entregaron. Lo único malo fue que las cisternas de dos baños dejaron de funcionar correctamente, nada grave igual, y el wifi del segundo piso para arriba no tenía señal.  Tanto Alfonso, el propietario como Victoria, la encargada de entregarnos el apartamento muy atentos. A destacar también el parrillero en la terraza para poder disfrutar de un buen asado.
Resumiendo, experiencia muy agradable. 
Todos contentos de haber elegido este aparlamento para disfrutar el fin de semana.
Saludos!
Nuestra estadía fue muy cómoda. El contacto con Alfonso y Victoria fue siempre muy fácil y cordial. Altamente recomendable para grupos grandes. Muy buena ubicación, cerca a varios restaurantes.
Los apartamentos muy buenos, súper cómodos y muy funcionales.
Muy buena ubicación. Los apartamentos están muy completos tal cual las fotos. No tuvimos ningún problema.

Muy buen recibimiento de Victoria y su esposo, estuvieron muy atentos en todo momento.
El departamento muy limpio y muy bien equipado, habitaciones muy luminoso, el espacio de la terraza con la parrilla excelente! 
El wifi anduvo muy bien.

Alfonso y las personas que trabajan con él son muy atentas, no hubo inconvenientes y las instalaciones son muy buenas. Agradezco u hospitalidad y sin duda regresaría, perfecta ubicación y confortable lugar. 5 estrellas sería mi calificación.

Cuando llegamos con mi familia tuvimos un pequeño percance, llegamos y no había nadie, pero era por el paro ... De ahí el lugar es muy lindo, muy acogedor, es tal cual como describe en las fotos! Muy limpio, ordenado, cumplía con todo los servicios.. El barrio es excelente, está cerca de todo! A nosotros nos gustó muchísimo !!! Pasamos súper bien !!! 
Y nuevamente gracias por todo !!!

La casa de Alfonso es muy acogedora y limpia. Tiene mucho espacio y es perfecta para grupos grandes. La ubicación es muy buena. Encontre muchos sitios donde comer y comprar. 

Muy recomendado!

Todo excelente, el departamento es tal cual aparece en las fotos. Si bien no pudimos interactuar mucho con Alfonso, se mostró dispuesto para que pudiéramos acceder al departamento a la hora que nosotros estimáramos conveniente. Muy buena ubicación.

En nombre mío y de los amigos con los que visitamos Buenos Aires recientemente, agradezco la disposición e interés de Alfonso por responder todas nuestras dudas, realizar recomendaciones de lugares que visitar en la ciudad y también de acceder a información clave, como por ejemplo dónde obtener un buen cambio. El lugar es completamente recomendable por la ubicación y por las comodidades que ofrece para grandes grupos de personas. Y esa terraza en el último piso es increíble. Muchas gracias, Alfonso. Seguiremos en contacto.
la experiencia en la casa como siempre muy buena!

Todo impecable, linda casa, limpia y el anfitrión siempre disponible.
Recomendable

Primero que todo es un excelente lugar para grupos o familias,pero ojo que no para carretear pues los vecinos son bastante exagerados (reclamaron por un asado a las 11:30 pm un día viernes ) .
En cuanto a la ubicación es bastante central para lugares de comida y al lado del metro.
Si bien al llegar al Depto la "fachada y ubicación " no te deja apreciar lo que vimos en fotos , al entrar nos encontremos con unos bonitos departamentos full equipados , había de todo y bastante cómodo.
Alfonso se mantuvo en contacto en todo momento y fue bien flexible con el horario de check in y el check out .
100% recomendado para grupos familiares , quizás no para carretes.

Saludos

muy buena experiencia!! totalmente recomendable...
el parrillero es un gran lugar para pasar el dia entero con amigos
Totalmente recomendable, en especial para grupos grandes, barrio tranquilo y cerca de todo. Alfonso un capo, siempre atento.

Barrio tranquilo, cerca del metro y de lugares donde comprar comida.
Los departamentos impecables, especial para grupos grandes. Buenísima presión del agua caliente.
Todo excelente.

El anfitrión 10 puntos. Tuve comunicación muy fluida en todo momento. El depto es de locos. Las fotos dicen mucho pero en vivo y directo mucho más! Mis amigos se quedaron copados. De la zona que decir, Palermo es de las mejores zonas de Buenos Aires y el depto está ubicado cerca de todo y a unas 10 cuadras de Plaza Serrano. La única pequeña contra es que hay una obra al lado y jode el ruido entre semana. Pero la verdad que no hay dudas que el combo vale ir a un depto como el de Alfonso! Mil gracias por todo y espero volver a ir en breve. Slds.

Todo muy bien! cuando llegamos el barrio no era tan bonito como esperábamos, estaba justo en el límite con Belgrano, pero está muy bien ubicado, cerca hay muchos sitios para ir caminando y es bastante céntrico. 
El departamento estaba impecable, con todo lo que necesitamos. Muy limpio y cómodo. 
Son tres mini departamentos unidos, lo que lo hacía más cómodo si viajan en grupos grandes.

Muy bueno todo. Los apartamentos muy cómodos, bien equipados y muy bien ubicados. 
Hubo flexibilidad en el horario de check-in y también de check-out y el contacto con Alfonso fue constante, siempre atento a cualquier necesidad. Definitivamente recomiendo quedarse acá.
Todo bien, los 3 departamentos cómodos y bien equipados. Lugar central y tranquilo, se puede caminar a Palermo en la noche con tranquilidad.
Todo excelente, el edificio muy bueno y cercano al metro. Nada malo que decir... Gracias por todo!
Buen lugar para pasar un tiempo en BsAs, cerca y conectado con todo.

La experiencia en los apartamentos de Alfonso fue excelente. El lugar es precioso y muy cómodo. Está muy bien ubicado y en una zona segura y tranquila.

El contacto con Alfonso fue constante y siempre estuvo atento a nuestras necesidades.

Muy recomendable!

Extremely clean and beautifully decorated with updated bathrooms and modern design throughout. Crackers, coffee and wine were waiting in every room when we arrived, and Roxana stayed to help us check in and get settled late into the night after our flight into Buenos Aires was delayed. Top notch Airbnb experience and great jumping off point to experience Palermo.
reviews.response: Thank you Savannah, kisses and have an excellent 2018

reviews.comments: Lorena was an outstanding hostess. She was tremendously accommodating and always made sure we were either well prepared or helped us with whatever our group needed. She was also very responsive on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), before/during/after our stay. The apartment is perfect for large groups, has an amazing private rooftop, and is conveniently located to markets, cafes, restaurants, and bakeries. The apartment/Lorena's hospitality was a significant reason why our trip to Buenos Aires was so great!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Lucas for your beautiful words and I hope to see you again. Kiss

reviews.comments: Ótima anfitriã. Hospedagem super confortável e aconchegante, tudo muito limpo e organizado. Excelente localização, bares, restaurantes e parques bem próximos, perfeito para um passeio. Fácil acesso ao transporte e próximo do aeroporto. RECOMENDO 100%
Excellent apartment and location, comfortable rooms and great outdoor area!

Excelente localização, proximo de boas opções de alimentação, de parques para crianças (Plaza Mafalda e Parque de la Ciência) , lavanderia e de transporte público. Ao mesmo tempo uma região tranquila, muito agradável de se caminhar.
O apartamento também é ideal para famílias, que podem estar juntas mas com a privacidade que cada apartamento oferece. É silencioso, limpo. 
Anfitriã muito atenciosa, realmente presente.

This was a wonderful place to stay with a big group. The only downside is a lack of common space, but when the weather is good the terrace is perfect. Highly recommend !! Thank you Roxana for everything.

The apartment was very conveniently located- only a few blocks away from train, subway, bus, restaurants, bakeries, cafes,etc.  the host is very responsive and accommodating. We stayed 12 days and had a wonderful stay.
Perfect for group. So many thx!!
Lovely place would recommend. We had a slight issue with the air con but apart from that it was great.
Alfonso and Santiago were incredibly responsive and very helpful. Santiago basically planned our trip to Buenos Aires and pretty much everything he said was exactly how it was.

Alfonso was so accommodating with a late booking, communication being excellent. 

We arrived late and were met by Santiago who was excellent. The place was as described and clean with ample room (much bigger than photos). 

It's well located with shops and bars nearby. Santiago was so helpful, he acted as a personal guide with his girlfriend when they were free. 

Would definitely visit again when in Argentina

Excellent séjour chez Alfonso, nous avons passé un weekend juste parfait! La literie est vraiment d'excellente qualité. L'endroit est exactement comme sur les photos et la terrasse sur le toit est parfaite pour les petits déjeuner au soleil ou les barbecues. Nous ne pouvions pas trouver mieux pour un grand groupe de 7. 
Alfonso a su répondre à toutes nos questions avant l'arrivé.

A melhor casa, no melhor bairro com os melhores anfitrioes. A melhor experiencia do Airbnb at agora.
Voltaremos mais vezes com certeza!

This was a great apartment for 8. We all had lots of room and the setup is perfect. The flexibility of check in and out was much appreciated. Victoria and Santiago were warm and friendly and very responsive. The location is in a cute neighborhood and it is very safe. Walking distance to excellent restaurants. Thank you!
Excelente localização! Prédio com apartamentos limpos e cama confortável. Fomos super bem recebidas e orientadas. Ficaria novamente lá, com certeza.

O prédio é excelente para grandes grupos, no meu caso, fomos dois casais, com duas crianças cada e uma babá,  ficamos super bem acomodados, com privacidade e, ao mesmo tempo, todos juntos! No entanto, tivemos problema com um ar condicionado, que não funcionou, e estava bem frio lá. No último andar a porta do banheiro da suíte não fecha e o banheiro tem um cheiro desagradável.  Quanto a localização, não achei excelente, fica praticamente em baixo de uma ponte onde dormem pessoas, gerando uma sensação de insegurança.

I came with my family to Buenos Aires to work. Our stay in Alfonso's house was great! Santiago received us warmly even if our flight arrived in the middle of the night. Everything was ready for us. He was very friendly and explained everything in the house and even borrowed us his own mixer to make the food for our baby. We used the Argentinian barbecue several times on the roof terasse but could not eat there unfortunately as it was too cold. Bear in mind that the house is divided in three individual apartments so if you re in a bigger group, you'll have three little kitchen instead of a big one so it might difficult to do a big diner unless you re barbecuing on the roof. You have a laundry next door that is washing in a record time everything you need better than you could do yourself. Thanks to Alfonso and his team for a pleasant stay!

The house is awesome nvery cozy, cool and in a great location. We've done a barbecue on the roof and could enjoy the Buenos Aires energy. 

Heather works ok. The only problem is the wifi. It was ver unstable and slow. Need to be fixed

Overwall, i full recommend to stay there

We totally loved our stay in BA and Alfonso's apartment was just what we needed. We booked all three apartments, a family of eight including two children and there was more than enough room for all of us to have some privacy or to be together in one of the apartments. We did not use the rooftop as it was so cold! 

Now to be honest, when we arrived, we were a bit concerned about the neighborhood and yes the facade with the doorway is practically under a bridge but our fears quickly vanished! We felt very safe and very comfortable walking at night and early on the morning.

The apartments are perfectly situated so that everything you want is just a short walk or even a few steps away.

The laundry lady is two doors down ( she does not iron though and the apartment does not have an iron which is my biggest complaint I think). There is a convenience mart across the bridge with essentials and where you can buy sim cards (need an unlocked phone). A supermarket, restaurants, subway, shops all within a few blocks. 

Our hosts were wonderful, even though they were flat out in bed sick. My step father got really ill and they helped us find a good hospital (about 6 blocks away) and kept checking in on us.

The apartments were clean and comfortable. The kitchenettes had everything we needed. The hot water in the bath worked perfectly.

Anything you need, the hosts are just a (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) / call away!

Our stay at the house was just amazing. The place offers more than enough space for eight people, so we were all comfortable. The "sofa beds" are fully comparable to a regular bed, in fact they actually are real beds with a "couch styling". The whole place is clean and in best conditions, way above local standards! The rooftop terrace is just amazing and a great spot to hang out and have a drink together.
Special thanks go out to Santiago who was a awesome person and helped us with literally everything. He showed us the best restaurants in town (not the tourist ones ;) ) and we also went out for some drinks together. All in a nutshell, our stay was just about perfect in BA, thanks to this amazing place and the great support!

Thank you Alfonso for having Santiago meet us at the apartment, he was wonderful!  He gave us a map, showed us all the hot spots with the limited time we had available.  The apartment was fantastic, we loved the space, security and wifi access.  The neighborhood is also safe, being a group of 5 women we walk everywhere and never had any problems. Loved it!!

We stayed at Alfonso's house for 3 nights as 7 people. It was in a great location, very comfortable, well equipped and spacious - just like in the photos. It was great for a large group to get together and socialise. The terrace was our favourite spot since the weather was fantastic. He was very helpful being flexible for check-out time and responding very quickly to our messages. Victoria and Santiago were also helpful in terms of checking us in and out. Everything worked out perfectly fine. Thank you for sharing this amazing house with us. We had great time in Buenos Aires!

I had a great overall experience in Alfonso's home/apartment.  He was always quick to respond and Victoria was very helpful when we checked in and out.  This apartment was great for our group, the three floors allowed us to spread out a bit and the rooftop was a great spot for us to hang out together.  The house is in a great location and was easily walkable to tons of restaurants.  I really enjoyed my stay there and would recommend it to friends.
Uitstekend appartement! Zeer ruim, en doordat het verschillende appartementen zijn, geweldig voor groepen

This was a great stay.  There are three apartments that can be treated as separate, or as one bigger house with a nice community rooftop for grilling/socializing. Everything is modern and newly redone...  The location is a perfect mix of a real neighborhood with access to subway, busses, taxis, and many local restaurants etc., without being on a noisy strip.  Alfonso, Victoria, and Santiago were all  kind and responsive...  If you are coming from new Jersey, Alfonso appreciates Taylor Ham.  I didn't have a chance to bring some, but will try to do so next time.

Everything went smoothly from the beginning. Alfonso had great communication and was even very understanding when one of the people had to cancel last minute. Very difficulty was made easier and every question answered. They received us very well and the place was huge and very modern and quirky.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, great location and facilities. Owners were very easy to communicate with and accommodating. I can personally highly recommend this apartment.

8 of us spent 3 nights in this apartment, which is very well located and easy to reach. Just a few minutes walk from the cafés and restaurants. It was spacious and comfortable for 8 persons as we could use all the 3 levels of the house. Victoria was very helpful and cooperative, she reacted very quickly to our questions or needs. The only thing we missed was the air conditioning from the living rooms as they were under repairation, however the dormitories were air conditioned.
Lovely apartments in a very convenient spot in the city, everything we needed and more my only regret is not having more time there!

The host personally welcomed my friends and I and provided great recommendations that helped us to enjoy our time in Buenos Aires.  The accommodations were clean, spacious, and well furnished.  The entire stay was seamless.  Highly recommend!
A localização é ótima.

We spent a week in the apartement with 5 persons and enjoyed the place very much.
Alfonso was very helpful on forehand and Victoria made us feel welcome when we arrived.
I would definitely recommend the apartment. It is located ideally in Palermo, with many great restaurants on walking distance.

Quero agradecer ao Alfonso pelo cuidado que teve com todos os detalhes de nossa estadia, desde as primeiras trocas de mensagens demonstrou ser um tremendo anfitrião. Agradecer a Victoria y Santiago pela recepção e por passar os detalhes da casa, bem como orientações de locomoção no bairro, metro, enfim, tudo. Limpeza impecável. Sempre disponíveis nas necessidades. Passamos dias maravilhosos na sua casa. Dica de um café a uma quadra e meia, Oui Oui, simplesmente fantástico.

The place itself is very spacious and located very close to many of the top restaurants in Buenos Aires. The place is also very close to the metro, allowing us to get around the city very easily. We came as a group of 5 and the space was more than enough. The host was very accommodating and provided us with many recommendations. Would definitely stay here again.

Six of us stayed at Alfonso’s apartments in Buenos Aires for two three day periods, separated by a week. Each couple had an apartment to themselves, with a living room, kitchen, bedroom and two bathrooms. Alfonso and his friend Santiago were extremely helpful with excellent recommendations and information about the city, and readily available by cell phone and email if needed. Each room had a bottle of Malbec and fresh food waiting on arrival.  Alfonso performed excellent translation duties on the phone when we had to inform a car rental agency of an airlines change in our flight times, and Santiago spent time taking us to get a SIM chip for our cell phone so we could have phone service in Argentina. Alfonso was an amazing host who made our stay very very comfortable.

We really enjoyed our stay in Buenos Aires. The apartments were lovely and clean and between the three we had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. The location is great; really close to supermarkets, restaurants, laundry and the metro. 
Everyone was really helpful, thanks for a great stay!

Being our second trip  we felt right at home.  Victoria and Santiago become  more than a host to my family and I 
, they became great friends .  We went shopping at great places came back with several leather jackets, and ate at the best  restaurants.  Victoria set us up with a local travel agent for a weekend trip to see the waterfalls she took care of everything for us.    I can not thank Victoria and Santiago enough for making our trip so memorable.  I would recommend this location to anyone traveling to Buenos Aires.

We had a wonderful time in Buenos Aires, thanks to Alfonso and Santiago! We were a group of MBA students just finished studying in Santiago, Chile and wanted to get away before getting back to school in LA. This apartment was perfect for our large group! Clean, lots of privacy, and very comfortable. Alfonso was always there to answer my questions, Pedro provided great transportation, and Santiago was so helpful in learning the area and giving us the dos and donts of BA. He even took care of currency exchange for us! Such a great way to spend our last week of break, we were so happy to stay here. Highly recommended, thank you so much Santiago and Alfonso!

Being our first visit to Argentina not knowing what to expect, I would have to say I was very nervous before arrival worrying if the location and home would be big enough and comfortable for my picky taste and if location was safe.  Alfonso was wonderful in replying to all my e-mails with many questions I had, he arranged for pick up transportation to both coming and going to airport.  Transportation service was on time both ways and was pleasant.  Victoria and Santiago were very welcoming at our arrival making sure we knew what was around locations and how to get to other places we wanted to visit.   Apartment was much bigger than I had expected, was great for privacy, location was perfect walking distance to great Cafes, Restaurants, wine bars , taxis , stores and laundry service.  Since our arrival time was late and we did not have time to exchange US dollars for peso, Santiago went to exchange money for us well we went to dinner.    We did experience some internet problems at times.  We definitely would stay at this location again and would highly recommend location.

Alfonso and Victoria were very welcoming upon our arrival at 2am after helping organising a seamless transfer to/from the airport.

The accommodation was as described by Jon in a previous review, 3 separate apartments in one building with the only common area being the rooftop.

It was very clean and comfortable and everyone was happy with the bedding configuration.

It was in an excellent location, close to the subway and overground railway station. It was also just around the corner from some excellent restaurants, cafes and bars.

I would recommend this property and BA. It is an amazing city!
The host was very accommodating with our large group, making single and double beds to accommodate our needs. The apartments were great for privacy and the rooftop was a nice common area.
Well located and comfortable. More than enough room for our 7 friends. Alfonso and Victoria were helpful and welcoming.
Alfonso was a great host. The location was perfect, the rooftop was enjoyed by everyone, and there was plenty of space for everyone. He had somewhere meet us when we arrived, and was very attentive.

8 of us had a great trip to Alfonso's place. We really liked that the apartment was split up into different flats--it's essentially a building containing several flats, each with their own entrance. It was clean and really conveniently located--the nearby bars and cafes in Palermo were great.

Alfonso's hosts took care of us while we were in Bs As, helping us to get some money changed, and giving us a few tips when needed.

Just a few pieces of feedback for other guests considering booking...

- While the apartment was really lovely, the photos do make it look just a little nicer than it is in reality. Good window dressing and composition :). We were a bit disappointed that there was no foosball table.
- Everything was really comfortable, but there were a few things such as door handles which fell off, which could do with a little maintenance.
- There are 3x wifi routers, but even so, we had some problems with the internet at times. If you're planning to work while staying here, you might have occasional difficulties.

However, we had a fantastic trip and would definitely stay here again in the future. Thanks a lot, Alfonso.

Alfonso was fantastic! We rented the apartment for 3 nights while we were in Buenos Aires. The apartment is in the perfect location, walking distance from some of the cutest cafes we found in Bs As. Alfonso helped with recommendations, money exchanges, etc. Really a great host! Would recommend to all.
Alfonso was a great host and very helpful with finding us things to do around the city. The house was very spacious and located in a great part of the city. Highly reccomended.

My family spent part of our Christmas holiday in Buenos Aires and we thoroughly enjoyed our time at the apartments.  The location was great.  The neighborhood had everything that we could need without being too touristy.  The nearest subway station was only a five minute walk away.

The apartments were private and comfortable.  The private rooftop was a real bonus too.  

Alfonso was an ideal host.  He greeted us when we arrived and helped us get settled.  He gave us great recommendations on things to see and places to go in Buenos Aires.  He even set up our cabs when we needed them.  He was always available and responded immediately whenever we had a question.  He really was perfect.

For our first visit to Buenos Aires, this was a great location and a perfect accommodation for a family seeking multiple residencies that were connected yet private. Our host aimed to meet our needs and there was ample wifi and amenities. Great restaurants nearby - try Oui Oui and the restaurant at Hotel Fierro down the street!

Alfonso's apartment was very spacious and comfortable. It's also great that it's essentially 4 private apartments in 1 so it would be perfect for a few couples or a few different people that want their own privacy on each floor of the apartment.
We had a great experience in buenos aires and with Alfonso. Everything went as planned and he was very helpful. The house is very similar to what you can see in the pictures and in a good location.

Thank you Alfonso for hosting us in Buenos Aires.  I had an amazing time in the city.  Alfonso was there to greet us when we arrived and provided us some great recommendations.  He was also very helpful throughout our stay, answering all our questions in a timely manner.  

The apartment was amazing.  It's located in area near many restaurants and bars while still being on a quiet street.  The apartment is four floors including the rooftoop terrace which we used throughout the weekend. 

For big groups the apartment is perfect.  There were three separate apartments on each floor.  It was perfect since we were able to break up the apartments between the party people and those who preferred to sleep early.   

I had a great time in Argentina and I highly recommend the apartment.

Our host, Alfonso, was extremely helpful and was at the Apts. when we arrived. He gave us tips on where to eat, shop and how to get to downtown on the subway and which tours to take. The Palermo Hollywood district was great during our 3 day stay and the apts. were as advertised. We spent overnight drinking wine on the 4th floor terrace. Great value.

Alfonso,
Once again I would like to thank you for all the help before and during our stay at the wine suites. We were in a group of 10 girls and we all had a blast during our stay. The apartment was even better than described, close to the metro and a lot of cafes and bars. I really hope I can come back some day to enjoy more of this amazing place and city.
Thank you again.

Alfonso was a great host since the moment I made the first contact to rent his home . He was very prompt ( within 1/2 hour )  in answering my first contact  .. As soon as got to the airport in Buenos Aires I called Alfonso as agreed and was personally waiting for us at the door of his home .  Everything was prepared as agreed previously over the phone ..
Alfonso gave us a detailed map of the neighborhood where we stayed and took his time to explain to us about best places to eat different types of food , type of taxi to take as well as subway and bus . He knows the area extremely well . During our stay called twice to see if anything additional was needed .. the whole experience was flawless .. thank you so much Alfonso !!! Muy agradecidos por tu gentileza ....
